recipes.title: Pasta Primavera
recipes.description: A light and fresh pasta dish featuring seasonal vegetables and herbs.
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions
Sauté vegetables and garlic in olive oil
Combine with pasta and season to taste
Garnish with fresh herbs

recipes.title: Quick Chicken Stir Fry
recipes.description: A healthy and flavorful stir-fry that comes together in minutes.
instructions: Slice chicken into thin strips
Stir-fry chicken until golden
Add vegetables and stir-fry until crisp-tender
Add sauce and seasonings
Serve hot over rice

recipes.title: Creamy Vegetable Curry
recipes.description: A rich and creamy curry packed with seasonal vegetables.
instructions: Sauté onions and garlic
Add curry paste and cook until fragrant
Add vegetables and coconut milk
Simmer until vegetables are tender
Garnish with cilantro

recipes.title: Penne alla Vodka
recipes.description: A classic Italian pasta dish featuring a creamy tomato-vodka sauce with crispy bacon.
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions
In a large pan, cook bacon until crispy, then remove and crumble
In the same pan, sauté onion and garlic until softened
Add vodka and cook for 2 minutes to burn off alcohol
Add tomato sauce, Italian seasoning, black pepper, and red pepper flakes
Simmer for 10 minutes
Stir in heavy cream and cook for 5 minutes
Add cooked pasta and toss to coat
Top with crumbled bacon and parmesan cheese
